眷.definition: (bound form) one's family, esp. wife and children; (literary) to regard with love and affection; to feel concern for

眷區.definition: married quarters; residential quarters for men with families

眷戀.definition: to miss; to long for; to remember with longing; yearning

眷村.definition: military dependents' village (community established in Taiwan for Nationalist soldiers and their dependents after the KMT retreated from the mainland in 1949)

眷眷之心.definition: nostalgia; home-sickness; longing for departed beloved

眷顧.definition: to care for; to show concern for; to think longingly (of one's country)
